ygData.subject: MESH / NETTED ARMOUR
ygData.msgSnippet: Do I have to live in the game just to get mesh or netted armour? I have been trying to find some ever since I got to level 8 (now I m level 11) and still have
ygData.messageBody:
Do I have to live in the game just to get mesh or netted armour? I have been
trying to find some ever since I got to level 8 (now I'm level 11) and still
have not found anything other than a mesh collar (whoop te do) What's up
with mesh? Why is there not enough of it? Must it be made or does it spawn
on certain NPC's? I'm wondering why I never see any vendors carry any mesh
items. Perhaps this is something I need to take up with Verant?

Thanks,
Derek Wilson
aka Spider-X

Linchao <Coalition of Fists>
